title: 'Long Covid': Why are some people not recovering?

description: The prime minister's comments come after Cineworld said it would temporarily close UK and US venues.

title: Man Utd transfer news: Jadon Sancho & Ousmane Dembele deals unlikely
description: Manchester United target Jadon Sancho seems certain to stay at Borussia Dortmund, while a deal for Barcelona's Ousmane Dembele is also doubtful.

title: Beirut blast was 'historically' powerful
description: The huge explosion in Beirut in August was one of the biggest non-nuclear explosions in history.

description: Chelsea and England striker Tammy Abraham apologises "for the naivety shown" after he breached coronavirus guidelines.

title: Grindr accounts could be easily hacked with email address
description: The vulnerability was fixed before being exploited by any malicious parties, the LGBT dating app says.

title: Nobel Prize for Medicine goes to Hepatitis C discovery

description: The US president's decision to greet supporters from a car comes under scrutiny from medical experts.
